name: Braeriach Guest House

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked a room with a bath. Turned up got given a map told you can eat there there or there. Very basic pointing in the right direction of breakfast room and lounge which were in darkness and very cold. It seemed like host never really cared or was interested.
reviews.title: Dissapointed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: You won't do better in the Highlands, trust me I've tried!
Outstanding scenic B&B! Highly recommend!!
reviews.text: Braeriach is a fab B&B which we've been to a number of times and we're going back later this year. We've tried to find decent accommodation all over the Highlands as we're up there a lot, and it's very difficult to get away from flowery B&B syndrome. Braeriach is different. Fiona has great taste, and it's like being at home - you can curl up in the sitting room in front of a roaring fire and it's just heaven. The family who run it are very welcoming and the meals are superb, so definitely go for that. There's the river flowing past outside, and it's in a really handy spot too for all sorts of Highland pastimes.

aka: Braeriach Guest House Kingussie, Scotland, UK
